00026 #ifndef NOISEINSTREAM_H

00028 
00029 #include <cstdlib>

00031 #include <string>

00034 #include "NoiseEndianUtils.h"

00036 namespace noisepp

00038 namespace utils

00040 
00042 class InStream
00043 {
00044         public:
00046                 InStream();
00048                 virtual void read (void *buffer, size_t len) = 0;
00050                 virtual size_t tell () = 0;
00052                 virtual void seek (size_t pos) = 0;
00054                 virtual ~InStream();
00055 
00057                 template <class T>
00058                 void read (T &t)
00059                 {
00060                         read (&t, sizeof(T));
00061                         EndianUtils::flipEndian (&t, sizeof(T));
00062                 }
00063 
00065                 int readInt ()
00066                 {
00067                         int i;
00068                         read (i);
00069                         return i;
00070                 }
00071 
00073                 double readDouble ()
00074                 {
00075                         double d;
00076                         read (d);
00077                         return d;
00078                 }
00079         protected:
00080         private:
00081 };
00082 
00084 class FileInStream : public InStream
00085 {
00086         private:
00087                 std::ifstream mFile;
00088         public:
00090                 FileInStream();
00093                 FileInStream(const std::string &filename);
00096                 bool open (const std::string &filename);
00099                 bool isOpen ();
00101                 void close ();
00103                 virtual void read (void *buffer, size_t len);
00105                 virtual size_t tell ();
00107                 virtual void seek (size_t pos);
00108 };
00109 
00111 class MemoryInStream : public InStream
00112 {
00113         private:
00114                 char *mBuffer;
00115                 size_t mPosition, mSize;
00116         public:
00118                 MemoryInStream ();
00122                 void open (char *buffer, size_t size);
00124                 char *getBuffer ()
00125                 {
00126                         return mBuffer;
00127                 }
00129                 size_t getBufferSize () const
00130                 {
00131                         return mSize;
00132                 }
00134                 virtual void read (void *buffer, size_t len);
00136                 virtual size_t tell ();
00138                 virtual void seek (size_t pos);
00139 };
00140 
00141 };
00142 };
